S06bsu050_u:2_0_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ dvādaśasāhasrapañcaśatairbodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ
S06bsu050_u:2_1: lokapālādidevakoṭiniyutasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ śrīsiṃhāsane viharati sma /
S06bsu050_u:3_0_0: atha khalu bodhisattvo mahāsattvo āryāvalokiteśvaro utthāya āsanādekamaṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ
S06bsu050_u:3_0_1: pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya prahasitavadano bhūtvā bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu bhagavān prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06bsu050_u:3_3: ye ca sattvā mantrasādhane udyuktāsteṣāṃ cāvighnena mantrāḥ sidhyanti /
S06bsu050_u:4_0: atha khalu bhagavān āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākaruṇikāya sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S06bsu050_u:4_1: yastvaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya pradhānāya ca dīrgharātraṃ niyuktaḥ /
S06bsu050_u:4_2: tena hi tvaṃ kulaputra śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
S06bsu050_u:4_6: ye ca sattvā mantrasādhane udyuktāsteṣāṃ cāvighnenaḥ mantrāḥ sidhyanti /
S06bsu050_u:5_0: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - tena hi sugata bhāṣatu sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya ca /
S06bsu050_u:6_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ sarvaduḥkhapramocano nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma,
S06bsu050_u:6_1: yasya ca samādhiṃ samāpannasya bhagavata ūrṇākośavivarāllavādanekāni raśmikoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma /
S06bsu050_u:6_5: yāvannārakāḥ sattvāḥ * * *sarve ca buddhakṣetrāṇi ṣaḍvikāraṃ praviceluḥ /
S06bsu050_u:7_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate sma /
S06bsu050_u:7_3: kṛtajñena bhavitavyam / kṛtavedinā ca bhavitavyam / sarvapāpaviratacittena bhavitavyam /
S06bsu050_u:7_6: tadyathā - oṃ mune mune mahāmunaye svāhā /
S06bsu050_u:7_7: / asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā lābhāt mayā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiranuprāptā /
S06bsu050_u:7_9: / mayā api iyameva (Svalp, Vaidya 94) prajñāpāramitā śrutā mahāśākyamunestathāgatasya sākṣāt /
S06bsu050_u:7_10_0: tena hi tvaṃ sarvabodhisattvānāmagrato buddhatve ca vyākṛtaḥ - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani sa(mantaraśmisamu)dgataḥ
S06bsu050_u:7_10_1: śrīkūṭarājā nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
S06bsu050_u:7_10_2: devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S06bsu050_u:7_11: [badiyamapi?] ye idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhayayiṣyanti,
S06bsu050_u:7_14: te sarve alpopāyena alpaśravaṇena ca tathāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu050_u:7_15: tadyathā - oṃ jeya jeya padmābhe avame avame sarasaraṇi dhiridhiri devatā anupālani yuddhottāriṇi paracakranivāriṇi pūraya pūraya bhagavati sarva āśā mama ca sarvasattvānāṃ ca /
S06bsu050_u:7_17: buddhādhiṣṭhite svāhā // iyaṃ sā kulaputra paramārthaprajñāpāramitā sarvabuddhānāṃ jananī bodhisattvamātā (bodhidātrī) pāpahārakā /
S06bsu050_u:7_18: sarvabuddhairapi na śaknoti asyānuśaṃsā vaktuṃ yāvatkalpakoṭiśatairapi /
S06bsu050_u:8_0: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kena kāraṇena bhagavan iyaṃ svalpākṣarā prajñāpāramitā? bhagavānāha - alpopāyatvāt /
S06bsu050_u:8_1: ye 'pi sattvā mandāsvādāḥ, te 'pi imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svalpākṣarāṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti likhayiṣyanti,
S06bsu050_u:8_3: anena kāraṇena kulaputra iyaṃ saṃkṣiptā svalpākṣarā prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu050_u:9_0: evamukte āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
S06bsu050_u:9_1: paramāścaryaṃ sugata, yāvadeva bhagavān sarvasattvahitāya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhāṣito mandapudgalānāmeva arthāya hitāya sukhāya ceti /
S06bsu050_u:10_1: te ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti /
